title: How to Make an Agua Shot

steps.headline: Free pour the coconut rum and blue curacao liqueur in a shot glass.
steps.description: You can also use a measuring utensil and "layer" the two ingredients in the glass.

steps.headline: Free pour or measure the Bailey's into the glass.
steps.description: It should sink to the bottom of the glass and "mix" with the curacao liqueur.

text: Free pour the coconut rum and blue curacao liqueur in a shot glass. You can also use a measuring utensil and "layer" the two ingredients in the glass. Free pour or measure the Bailey's into the glass. It should sink to the bottom of the glass and "mix" with the curacao liqueur.
